meanings.definition: A close-fitting, elastic fabric used for making undergarments.
meanings.sent1: She wore comfortable stockinets under her dress.
meanings.sent2: The store sold a variety of stockinets for undergarments.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally wore his stockinets to the beach instead of swim trunks.
meanings.sent4: The stockinets hugged her body like a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The soft stockinets kept her warm on chilly nights.

meanings.definition: A machine-knitted fabric used for making stockings.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced colorful stockinets for stockings.
meanings.sent2: She loved the feel of the stockinets against her skin.
meanings.sent3: He mistakenly used the stockinets as a scarf due to their length.
meanings.sent4: The stockinets flowed gracefully over her legs.
meanings.sent5: The delicate stockinets added elegance to her outfit.
